EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Taking action on your feedback NCR is always improving Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, At NCR, we are dedicated to supporting the success of your business and focused on building our shared relationship. We appreciate the feedback we received from our customers in our 2019 Customer Satisfaction Survey. Your experience and insights help us improve and grow. Your input told us that you want us to continue to focus on these areas: - Improve product quality, availability and reliability - Increase customer service responsiveness and resolution - Simplify, streamline and accelerate our invoicing process Improving the customer experience is at the core of our vision and strategy. Every day, we strive to treat every customer like they are our only customer. Thank you for being a customer of NCR. My best, Michael D.
